Posts.EditableText: I guess this question is for Alex.  Are there any plans to make questnet able to have save files?  Or does it do this and I've just missed it?
Posts.HTML: I guess this question is for Alex.  Are there any plans to make questnet able to have save files?  Or does it do this and I've just missed it?

Posts.EditableText: You can save games from the Game menu, using Save or Save As.
Posts.HTML: You can save games from the Game menu, using Save or Save As.

Posts.EditableText: Oh.  And that will save player's as well?  Cool.  Thanks again.
Posts.HTML: Oh.  And that will save player's as well?  Cool.  Thanks again.
